A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was hoping the movie would get better as it went on and on. It just had scenes that dragged on and dumb attempt at jokes. It was nothing like the real Star Wars that Lucas created. It was all Disney’s lame Interpretation of a great film. Star Wars is supposed to be about family\, fights\, conflict\, sides and resolve! Not ships and lame Disney drama. Disney F’ed up Star Wars for good! What a waste of money!
